KNOWINGLY AND INTENTIONALLY DISTRIBUTE A MIXTURE OR SUBSTANCE CONTAINING A DETECTABLE AMOUNT OF COCAINE, A SCHEDULE II CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE(4r)

FELON IN POSSESSION OF A FIREARM(7r)

FELON IN POSSESSION OF A FIREARM(10r-11r)
18:922G.F    FELON IN POSSESSION OF A FIREARM

charges.charge_offence_description: 18:922G.F    FELON IN POSSESSION OF A FIREARM

charges.charge_description: KNOWINGLY AND INTENTIONALLY DISTRIBUTE A MIXTURE OR SUBSTANCE CONTAINING A DETECTABLE AMOUNT OF HEROIN, A SCHEDULE I CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE(3r)

charges.charge_disposition: The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for the total term of 120 months, with recommendations to the BOP. Supervised release for a term of three years. Special assessment of $300.00 due immediately.

charges.charge_description: KNOWINGLY AND INTENTIONALLY USE, CARRY, AND POSSESS A FIREARM IN FURTHERANCE OF A DRUG TRAFFICKING CRIME AND DID KNOWINGLY AND INTENTIONALLY BRANDISH THE SAME(6r)

charges.charge_disposition: The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for the total term of 120 months, with recommendations to the BOP. Supervised release for a term of three years. Special assessment of $300.00 due immediately.

charges.charge_description: FELON IN POSSESSION OF A FIREARM(8r)

charges.charge_disposition: The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for the total term of 120 months, with recommendations to the BOP. Supervised release for a term of three years. Special assessment of $300.00 due immediately.
